New Records: Klay Thompson broke the previous record for threes in a Mavericks debut (six)
Key Match Events: Luka Doncic threw a pass backwards over his head to P.J. Washington for a three that extended the Mavericks' lead to 14
Luka Doncic passed to Klay Thompson at the three-point line where he was so wide open, he needed to take a quick dribble to set his rhythm before canning a three
Post-Match Reflections: Harrison Barnes shot 70% from the floor on 10 shot attempts
The Mavericks shot an abysmal 28.6% FG and 18.2% from three in the first quarter
There were a few too many lazy plays sprinkled throughout this game
Allowing a team to cut 10 points out of a 21-point lead in the garbage time moments of the fourth quarter is a regular occurrence in the NBA, but itâ€™s still a bit frustrating
Miscellaneous Highlights: Jason Kidd was still tinkering with the lineup
Harrison Barnes got just about anything he wanted, particularly in the first half
